website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for a polo that provides added warmth, this long-sleeved option is high quality at an affordable cost.
pros: Stain resistant material makes this polo easy to wash and maintain
Pre-shrunken fabric is convenient for washing purposes
Made of quality, lightweight fabric that doesn’t feel obtrusive, especially around the neck
cons: Designed to fit more snugly, which some may wish to avoid

customer_reviews.title: Affordable polo shirt, great for the cool Mississippi weather
customer_reviews.text: This time of year you don't need a sweater in Mississippi yet, but long sleeves are a must. I was looking online for some cost-effective long-sleeve shirts that I could easily wear for business casual and casual. This was perfect. It looks good with slacks or jeans. Looks and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Webb

customer_reviews.title: Dog owners, beware.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog that sheds, please be forewarned that this shirt will collect every single dog hair in the dryer. Every. Single. One. #polyester It will come out looking like your animal is attached to it somehow. I have to spend ten minutes (not exaggerating) removing dog hair with both a lint brush and a lint sticky roller. The shirt is great and fits great and washes well with no fading and wrinkling, but it is NOT pet hair friendly. Everyone else, knock yourself out, because it is a great shirt.
customer_reviews.author: ZanIAm

customer_reviews.title: Uniform
customer_reviews.text: I found myself struggling most mornings to put an outfit together for work, my solution - create a uniform! These have all the fashion and function of a button down, without requiring you to actually button anything. They are durable and machine washable, which add an extra layer of convenience and they go well with a sport jacket, making them versatile (and inexpensive) additions to your corporate wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Andreae

customer_reviews.title: I got a blue one and liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This is my second shirt from this style. I got a blue one and liked it a lot, now have a color choice. Originally wanted long sleeve protection when doing outdoor community outreach projects for a club. For that purpose it is excellent. It turns out to be stylish enough to wear to casual nice activities like a meal with family. I usually end up wearing my lunch. Yesterday a blob of dressing from a sandwich wiped right off and the shirt came through the wash with no spot. Good stain protection and no wrinkles from the dryer. Fit is as expected (just right for my XXL torso) and finish quality is good. Very happy with this shirt!
customer_reviews.author: shawkrider

customer_reviews.title: The length of the Shirt is Long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. I'm a 145 lb woman standing 5' 8". I wanted long sleeves and couldn't find this shirt in the women's dept. I was amazed at how good the top fit in xl. The sleeves are nice and long and the material is a cotton blend, which makes it lightweight. The length of the body is long, so if you're long waisted this will fit. It's almost too long for me as it comes down to the tops of my thighs. Great product, I'd definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Debby P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality made but I feel it was a touch smallish. No problem I always order a size larger for Ts and Polos as I like a longer tail to tuck in. These aren't 100% cotton but are very comfortable anyway once washed. Having a little bit of synthetic fiber helps keep their shape and seems to make them last longer. Coupled with its low price I feel this is a bargain. All in all very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Casch

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good material.  XL fits more like XXL
customer_reviews.text: The shirt came quickly and it looks and feels very nice for the price. I generally wear size XL but this particular shirt in XL was much too large so I exchanged it for a size L. The cotton-polyester blend is definitely superior to 100% cotton. This shirt can be used as uniform attire or even business casual attire if you throw on some slacks. I wish these came in wider array of colors, other than that, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Ace

customer_reviews.title: Very good shirt for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for inexpensive cotton polo shirts to wear in the winter, primarily under other layers. The shirt would not need to be super fancy, only comfortable. This shirt, though very plain, is exactly what I was looking for. It is also tagless which adds to the comfort level. This shirt has a nice long tail, so it stays tucked in. I would not recommend this shirt for wearing untucked.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Blady Jr

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell is a No-Go
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine shirt. It looks good, it fits well, it seems to hold up to repeated washings. The navy color is very close to what's pictured, and the fabric feels better than what you expect from a poly blend. However, there is a very strong chemical smell that has persisted through multiple washings. Maybe it's a fire retardant coating or something to do with the spot shield marketing. Whatever it is, the smell lingers on other clothes stacked on or near the shirts. That alone will keep me from buying another copy of this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cool-weather casual shirts!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a half-dozen of these shirts in various colors and LOVE them. Very comfortable, and perfect for winter in Arizona (daytime highs in 50s and 60s). I'm 6'5", and take a 36" sleeve in dress shirts, and these shirts (XL size) are long enough in both the body and sleeves without needing Tall sizes. No shrinkage to speak of after multiple washings. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Limmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for women too
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric, it washes beautifully. I am a woman and I bought this for me, I am tall and I have long arms, women's long sleeve shirts sometimes have sleeves that are too short. This is perfect, just wish there were more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual pullover shirt
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my 2 new Jerzees polo sport shirts. Tried both on and they both fit well and are just what i wanted. Cuffs are snug which is good, just right, some shirts have very wide loose cuffs which I don't care for, I find loose cuffs unattractive. Got both shirts with long sleeves which I want, prefer these kind of shirts with long sleeves. Quality shirts at a decent price. You can't go wrong!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shirt was also a short sleeve even know...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Long sleeve shirt last week and it arrived as a short sleeve shirt. I sent it back and they were very quick to send out another shirt. This shirt was also a short sleeve even know the ad reads long sleeve. The small white label on the clear wrapper also states that it is a long sleeve. Obviously miss labeled merchandise. once they fix the problem, I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good shirts at great price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat these long sleeve polo shirts for the price. With Fall arriving, I needed to switch from short sleeve to longer sleeve polo shirts and bought 4 of these Jerzee's long sleeve polos. Quality is good. Fit is perfect ( I am 6'1", 180 lbs and a large fits perfectly). Price is amazing. I highly recommend this shirt
customer_reviews.author: 2007pony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Work or School Shirt at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a very good shirt for the price, especially for work or school purposes. I didn't have any issues with the size; it was loose as expected and not clingy. The material is slightly thinner than expected but is not at all a serious issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a nice business / professional polo and received a collared long sleeve T-shirt. The material is cheap and thin, just like your old fruit of loom t-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is great but material is thin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old in a size small, navy. It will fit him just fine with some room to grow into while not looking sloppy. I took off a star because this long sleeve is quite thin. I ordered long sleeve shirts for the winter months. Something to consider if you are purchasing these for a cold climate.
customer_reviews.author: PatTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Shirt fit fine. The buttons are sewn on with white thread. I would recommend they use a thread that matches the color of the shirt, so that it is invisible when the inside is exposed at the top button, which often is left open, not secured through the button hole.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirts for those cool golf mornings in AZ in the winter. I wear a top n over it when 40-50 degrees then peel it off to this shirt as day warms. I’m usually a 2xltall but in these 2X fits best
customer_reviews.author: Jordy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice for great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband is happy with his new shirts. He got the XL and they fit great. He wears for work. He does wish shirts were a little heavier for cooler weather. Washes well and fabric stays soft.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Anne

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a young man. The color is a very dark navy, and the sleeves are long enough even after washing it the first timer. It held its shape well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. I am a big large. Sometimes I have to wear extra large. This shirt in a large size fit me well and did not shrink when I dried it.
customer_reviews.author: David Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female and bought this shirt to cut it into a crop top. I'm 5'5" 117 pounds and a small fits me perfect, no bagginess, maybe even a little tight. The green color bleeds in the wash, only washed it once though so not sure if it won't bleed anymore after the first wash. But it didn't lose its color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not what was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was Polo shirts, they turned out to be long sleeved T- Shirts, not what I expected of wanted. I needed them for cold weather conditions, it is 39 degrees today, how can I go outside wearing one of these shirts?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Chiszar

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something with a heavier weight. This is similar to a light weight polo shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Giles

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough fit.  Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: A little large across the shoulder. Not a big issue. May try a medium next time ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Zaphoidbeetlebox

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have tattoos and need to cover up for business casual dress code
customer_reviews.text: Hard to measure yourself out when buying clothes online. Buuuuut, that being said, this is a great alternative shirt to wear when the company you work for doesn’t allow your tattoos to show.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, a little big because you always have to go a size up for shirts made in Asia but comfortable and didn't shrink in the wash
customer_reviews.author: Mid-Atlantic Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look and nice style
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2x for my husband. Great look!! Fit nice , wash’s nice, no shrinking!!! Over all... would definitely purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Long sleeve!!
customer_reviews.text: These Long sleeve shirts fit great. I'm a 2xl , the shirt fits great with a bit of room to spare. The colors look great and my wife thinks I look great in them. I've purchased 2 of these shirts and ready to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still in Use 2 yrs later.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these in several colors, for me after two years of casual use they are holding up well and are still in use. However, they have never been soft no matter how much downy I use and after a while they tend to feel itchy. I still use them as I have not found a good substitute yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear to work and it's been perfect. Its light weight but decent quality material. It has washed well and hasn't faded much. After he wore it a few times he had me order him more in different colors. Definitely reccomend this item.
customer_reviews.author: lacy jo johnson

customer_reviews.title: Try 3XL next time
customer_reviews.text: Shirt is too tight for a 2XL. I have XL's that fit better, and sleeves are very tight also, particularly at the cuff. I Didn't order 2XL because I'm toned & lean, c'mon folks sell them to fit !
customer_reviews.author: M.W. Beau

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitted shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like the 50/50 blend and the XLarge worked great for me--6"1-195. Not sure how it will come out of the wash but for $12 if I get 4-5 good wears out of it then it is worth it. I liked it better than some Perry Ellis long sleeves I bought.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a test sample for a future bulk order to have embroidered with our company logo. The fit was accurate and did not shrink in the laundry. This is a quality shirt and the price can't be beat. I'll be ordering about 200 of these shortly for our employees.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn G. Damore

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for the money... I’m 6’3” and it fits very well... I line dry them as I’m sure the dryer would shorten their life. Now have three of these shirts and would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A McMillon

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves a bit long and material not breathable
customer_reviews.text: The size fits right around the shoulders and neck, but the arms feel a little long. The material is also not that breathable so it gets kind of stuffy underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Jiung Song

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap and not properly packed
customer_reviews.text: It feels a lot of synthetic material used in it, it does not feel light and not breathing material. Cheaply packed and cheap look to the whole thing, the sleeves end with a very tight ending very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Avid Customer

customer_reviews.title: Workplace appropriate while maintaining comfort
customer_reviews.text: Needed a collared shirt for work and found this product for a low price. It fit perfect, was comfortable and was appropriate for the workplace.
customer_reviews.author: JREDENTE9

customer_reviews.title: Great cotton long sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Easy wash and dry. Fits great and looks fine. After 10 washings and still looks good. I feel a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt just fragile in the threading
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loved it and it looks incredible on him as he doesn't like tight sleeves. But the material is rather fragile.
customer_reviews.author: dawn laurance

customer_reviews.title: The shirt fit to size
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort of the shirt, very good. I recommend anyone needs a long sleeve polo, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Very typical cheap uniform type of shirt, but that's what I knew and ordered. Fits the bill for a long sleeved polo just to wear around.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I wear extra large to be comfortable, but even before washing, this shirt was too small and tight. Material seemed ok, but watch sizing.
customer_reviews.author: John A Ebright

customer_reviews.title: Great quality polo
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my fiancé. The color is a nice forest green. Only thing is when you dry it you need to pull it right out of the dryer because it is not wrinkle free. Holds up great in the wash and color is still vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. It fit perfect. Used it for family pictures
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Vizcarra

customer_reviews.title: Good casual shirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend’s Ron Swanson halloween costume, and he loved it! Good quality and comfortable. He’s usually a large in shirts, and this fit perfectly. He actually likes this so much he’s going to wear it regularly as a casual shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Like 'em so much I got one of every color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several of these for work. 6 months of wear and washing and these shirts still look great
customer_reviews.author: PJC

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric; feels good and looks good after wash ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric; feels good and looks good after wash & dry. Fit a bit snug compared to usual XL but has long tail and stays in my trousers.
customer_reviews.author: bev & jim

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shirt I ordered so much that I ordered 5 more. I have fancier and more expensive shirts of this type and these are the perfect ones for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long Sleeve Polo Sport Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and soft. Perfect fit , good for working . Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Comfort A+
customer_reviews.text: Great for a cool day on the golf course or a pajama top if you get caught in a blizzard in Denver! Comfortable, easy-care
customer_reviews.author: EdoardoG

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My fault! Estimated size XXL was right for me but perhaps I have lost some of my "GIRTH" will order XL later! Otherwise Great all round.
customer_reviews.author: G. B. Hosler

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several colors and I like them. Be sure to wash them in the delicate cycle.
customer_reviews.author: auredsoxfan

customer_reviews.title: great relaxed fit
customer_reviews.text: Material is soft and good quality. Looks good. I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: gkc

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels comfortable. This shade of blue is quite dark, but looks good. This appears to be a very well made shirt, enough to order two more in additional colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jjoek1

customer_reviews.title: For the price - this is an excellent shirt! Not the softest fabric
customer_reviews.text: For the price - this is an excellent shirt! Not the softest fabric, but it fit to size and looks good. I will order more colors
customer_reviews.author: FussPro

customer_reviews.title: Quality shirt for summer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for work. Lightweight, true to size, great color green.
customer_reviews.author: Kamilla

customer_reviews.title: Blank canvas - GO
customer_reviews.text: Nice look, fall / winter feel, maybe cool with color T peaking out of V button neck. Thinking of it as a blank canvas. Also, thinking of wearing a tie with, satin blue and silver. I've already come up with ten new outfits. Something with mmm lime green! Think of the possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Warner Design

customer_reviews.title: The Fabric of the shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shirt and made me comfy to wear it at work and the color is very nice love it.
customer_reviews.author: rsbernardo

customer_reviews.title: Good Value as Office Work Shirt in Fall and Winter.
customer_reviews.text: Washed many times. No Fade or Shrinkage. Warm in cool temps.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Sauers

customer_reviews.title: size runs a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: Medium size is smaller than expected. Thin material. Prob only good to wear under a sweater like a T-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Received in good new condition. It fits as advertised and is a real casual wearing shirt. It's thinner material but that works good for me s I dress in light layers. good buy for the price and quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shirt
customer_reviews.text: I found the shirt to be very comfortable. I will be getting more of them!
customer_reviews.author: Buggsy

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect item
customer_reviews.text: The shirt that I received was not a long sleeve, it was a short sleeve but I used it any ways because I needed it for work. Whoever checked this invoice before shipping did not thoroughly check the merchandise. I still want a long sleeve, but I will look elsewhere. As you could see the photo and description it clearly states LONG SLEEVE.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well (size appropriate), washes well (no shrinking, no pills), and so far it's holding up very well. Great shirt for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hank Polk

customer_reviews.title: They are Ok
customer_reviews.text: More like T-shirt material. Made for wearing tucked not outside the pants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband, he loves it. I asked if it was comfortable to wear, and he said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, but seams came apart after 20 washes in a years time
customer_reviews.text: I like this shirt. It fits well. One year later , the seam underneath the right arm came apart. I think I washed it about 20 times. I’m not sure I will buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: lliko-usa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the shirt,and it is very warm to wear and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: MJK

customer_reviews.title: Fits like it should
customer_reviews.text: It fits and looks good. I usually don't like zipper collars but this works well
customer_reviews.author: Bill2078

customer_reviews.title: Arms too skinny.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is not bad for the price, a nice rich red. It washes up well. I have a problem with the fit. I ordered a small men's for my teenaged son and the body of the shirt is perfect. The lower arms, however, are so skinny that I don't think a full sized man would be able to get them over his forearms. It's a struggle to get it on. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm. Very soft fabric and perfect for layering
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect on Me.
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect fit and the color is sweet.
customer_reviews.author: David Adetutu

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and feels good ( not soft but still good). The material is on the thin side. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Honkbal

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive shirt
customer_reviews.text: To light weight for my liking. I was looking for a thick work shirt.
customer_reviews.author: vette

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfect. I have always preferred mens shirts more than ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfect. I have always preferred mens shirts more than womens as they always fit right. I am short and have short arms and the sleeves are really long but I can just roll them up. Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Grant

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit rough texture
customer_reviews.text: As expected, but the material has a coarse feel for a polyester. Not a problem unless you want a soft fabric against your skin- or your girl's!
customer_reviews.author: Privacy Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Very comfortable. Had to wash before wearing as they had a strange almost petroleum like odor. Washing them removed the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lamade

customer_reviews.title: I am 6'3" and need loong sleeves. These shirts ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'3" and need loong sleeves. These shirts do the trick. Tried one and then ordered 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Material
customer_reviews.text: Material seems to be thinner than expected but the price was low so ......
customer_reviews.author: rosebuddy

customer_reviews.title: Great collared shirts
customer_reviews.text: After washing them they fit just as expected. The cuffs are a little too tight but everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: CLD

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my dad!
customer_reviews.text: My dad is 90 and needed long sleeve shirts with no buttons. These are perfect! He says they are comfortable and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Atsland

customer_reviews.title: It did arrived on time and still look in great condition after a few washes
customer_reviews.text: This shirt fit as expected. It did arrived on time and still look in great condition after a few washes. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Logistics

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable! Fits well ! As Expected !
customer_reviews.text: My dad liked his shirt... Size is great and nice ! Thought it would be a little bit heavier (thicker material ) . It’s a light nice shirt ! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Hassett

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: The husband got two of these for Christmas and wears them frequently. When asked whether he liked them, he said, "They're good." And they're affordable, so I think they're good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rash

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt. I gave it to my husband for his birthday and he liked it. I ordered xl and it was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A bit thin but as described.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was nice and bright red as hoped, but a bit thin. I was hoping it was more of a rugby-weight fabric, but it is more of a t-shirt weight.
customer_reviews.author: A Real Person

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Casual Activities
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the Jerzee's long sleeve polo shirts. The cotton blend is comfortable, and seems wrinkle-resistant. The fit is as I expected, and I think they are perfect for Southern winters.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Ventimiglio

customer_reviews.title: and feel thin like that, not as thick as a 100% cotton ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of them say 50% cotton and yet the description says 100% cotton, so I wasn't sure what I would get, but these are definitely 50%, and feel thin like that, not as thick as a 100% cotton would be. But for the price, it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Objectify

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and plenty of room!!
customer_reviews.text: Required for work and have to wear it over thermal shirt and a turtleneck!!! I work in the freezer but uniform required!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Forlenza

customer_reviews.title: Tear on the sleeve after first wear
customer_reviews.text: First day I wore it I saw a tear at the wrist part of the sleeve but I guess you get what you pay for they were cheap long sleeve shirts I bought to wear to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: thinner than other shirts
customer_reviews.text: I have some other LS polos and these are a little thinner, which is ok since I get warm easy. Shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loved this shirt
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Looks good. Soft shirt and my husband loved it. You can't beat this shirt for the value.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great shirts
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these tops. Have already bought him 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great product great durability and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pull over for every occasion I recommended your family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Janan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this work shirt, looking forward to wearing to work during the winter months. Package received early 3 day before expected due date.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: very good quality, i'm wearing it now as i'm typing. i like it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Hector J

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my uncle. Hey loves them. I will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small...but my husband wears if once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: customer

product_meta.title: Jerzees Men's Spot Shield Long Sleeve Polo Sport Shirt
product_meta.description: JERZEES Spot Shield men's long sleeve polo sports shirts are great for everyday wear and for jobs that get messy. Water and most oil-based liquids simply bead up and roll right off the fabric preventing staining. The magic behind these incredible shirts is our stain-resisting technology is designed to be long lasting and provide protection over the life of the shirt. Plus, the 50/50 blend reduces fading and shrinking for an even longer lasting look. Long sleeves are also a great option to protect you from the sun in warmer months, or keep you warm in colder temperatures. Available up to 2XL in a variety of great colors.
